title: SoC PERF_ST 515-0-21 Seminar: Problems in Performance Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Why did Adorno hate jazz? What do jazz and black life contribute to Adorno's project of social critique? Can jazz be understood as music of freedom and the individual in light of the afterlife of slavery? The seminar stages a conversation between critical theorist, Theodor Adorno and the black radical tradition, to explore areas of common interest and to question the absence of black modern experience from European critical theory.
